dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT :LOC_CODE loc_cd, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'Month') month1, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 1), 'Month') month2, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 2), 'Month') month3, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 3), 'Month') month4, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 4), 'Month') month5, TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 5), 'Month') month6 FROM DUAL

SELECT a.destination destination_c1, a.commodity commodity_c1, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.open_tons),0),0) open_tons_c1, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.planned_tons),0),0) planned_tons_c1, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.open_tons),0) - ROUND(SUM(a.shipped_tons),0),0) remaining_tons_c1, NVL(ROUND(a.booked_tons,0),0) booked_tons_c1 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT oob.order_base_gid, loc.location_xid destination, obref2.ob_refnum_value commodity, obl.weight_base / 2204.5855379 open_tons, (SELECT SUM(wt.weight) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid, ((CASE WHEN ssu1.tag_3 IS NULL THEN ssu1.unit_net_weight_base ELSE 0 END) / 2204.5855379) weight FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul1 INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu1 ON ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) wt) planned_tons, NVL((SELECT SUM(wt.weight) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid, ((CASE WHEN ssu1.tag_3 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ssu1.unit_net_weight_base END) / 2204.5855379) weight FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul1 INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu1 ON ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) wt),0) shipped_tons, (SELECT (SUM(NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) * 21) + (SUM(NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0)) * 26) FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN consol cnsl ON cvr.charter_voyage_gid = cnsl.charter_voyage_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND((NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) OR (NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0))) AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND cv.dest_location_gid = obl.dest_location_gid AND (TO_DATE((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM') AND TO_DATE((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(SYSDATE))) booked_tons FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN ob_refnum obref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obref1.order_base_gid AND obref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN ob_line obl ON obref1.order_base_gid = obl.order_base_gid INNER JOIN location loc ON obl.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obref2 ON obl.order_base_gid = obref2.order_base_gid AND obref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE oob.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND SUBSTR(oob.order_base_xid, 1, 1) = 'S' AND obref1.ob_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND (TO_DATE(obl.early_pickup_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM') AND TO_DATE(obl.early_pickup_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT obr.order_base_gid FROM ob_refnum obr WHERE obr.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CLOSE/REOPEN' AND obr.ob_refnum_value = 'CLOSE')) a GROUP BY a.destination, a.commodity, NVL(ROUND(a.booked_tons,0),0) ORDER BY a.destination, a.commodity

SELECT a.destination destination_b1, a.servprov servprov_b1, NVL(SUM(a.teu_count),0) teus_b1, NVL(SUM(a.feu_count),0) feus_b1 FROM (SELECT cv.charter_voyage_gid, loc1.location_xid destination, loc2.location_xid servprov, NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0) teu_count, NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0) feu_count FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN location loc1 ON cv.dest_location_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN location loc2 ON cv.servprov_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN consol cnsl ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cnsl.charter_voyage_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND ((NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) OR (NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0))) AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND (TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM') AND TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(SYSDATE))) a GROUP BY a.destination, a.servprov ORDER BY a.destination, a.servprov

SELECT a.destination destination_c2, a.commodity commodity_c2, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.open_tons),0),0) open_tons_c2, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.planned_tons),0),0) planned_tons_c2, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.open_tons),0) - ROUND(SUM(a.shipped_tons),0),0) remaining_tons_c2, NVL(ROUND(a.booked_tons,0),0) booked_tons_c2 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT oob.order_base_gid, loc.location_xid destination, obref2.ob_refnum_value commodity, obl.weight_base / 2204.5855379 open_tons, (SELECT SUM(wt.weight) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid, ((CASE WHEN ssu1.tag_3 IS NULL THEN ssu1.unit_net_weight_base ELSE 0 END) / 2204.5855379) weight FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul1 INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu1 ON ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) wt) planned_tons, NVL((SELECT SUM(wt.weight) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid, ((CASE WHEN ssu1.tag_3 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ssu1.unit_net_weight_base END) / 2204.5855379) weight FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul1 INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu1 ON ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) wt),0) shipped_tons, (SELECT (SUM(NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) * 21) + (SUM(NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0)) * 26) FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN consol cnsl ON cvr.charter_voyage_gid = cnsl.charter_voyage_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND((NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) OR (NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0))) AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND cv.dest_location_gid = obl.dest_location_gid AND (TO_DATE((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,1),'MM') AND TO_DATE((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,1)))) booked_tons FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN ob_refnum obref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obref1.order_base_gid AND obref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN ob_line obl ON obref1.order_base_gid = obl.order_base_gid INNER JOIN location loc ON obl.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obref2 ON obl.order_base_gid = obref2.order_base_gid AND obref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE oob.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND SUBSTR(oob.order_base_xid, 1, 1) = 'S' AND obref1.ob_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND (TO_DATE(obl.early_pickup_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,1),'MM') AND TO_DATE(obl.early_pickup_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,1))) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT obr.order_base_gid FROM ob_refnum obr WHERE obr.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CLOSE/REOPEN' AND obr.ob_refnum_value = 'CLOSE')) a GROUP BY a.destination, a.commodity, NVL(ROUND(a.booked_tons,0),0) ORDER BY a.destination, a.commodity

SELECT a.destination destination_b2, a.servprov servprov_b2, NVL(SUM(a.teu_count),0) teus_b2, NVL(SUM(a.feu_count),0) feus_b2 FROM (SELECT cv.charter_voyage_gid, loc1.location_xid destination, loc2.location_xid servprov, NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0) teu_count, NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0) feu_count FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN location loc1 ON cv.dest_location_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN location loc2 ON cv.servprov_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN consol cnsl ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cnsl.charter_voyage_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND ((NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) OR (NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0))) AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND (TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,1),'MM') AND TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,1)))) a GROUP BY a.destination, a.servprov ORDER BY a.destination, a.servprov

SELECT a.destination destination_c3, a.commodity commodity_c3, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.open_tons),0),0) open_tons_c3, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.planned_tons),0),0) planned_tons_c3, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.open_tons),0) - ROUND(SUM(a.shipped_tons),0),0) remaining_tons_c3, NVL(ROUND(a.booked_tons,0),0) booked_tons_c3 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT oob.order_base_gid, loc.location_xid destination, obref2.ob_refnum_value commodity, obl.weight_base / 2204.5855379 open_tons, (SELECT SUM(wt.weight) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid, ((CASE WHEN ssu1.tag_3 IS NULL THEN ssu1.unit_net_weight_base ELSE 0 END) / 2204.5855379) weight FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul1 INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu1 ON ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) wt) planned_tons, NVL((SELECT SUM(wt.weight) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid, ((CASE WHEN ssu1.tag_3 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ssu1.unit_net_weight_base END) / 2204.5855379) weight FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul1 INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu1 ON ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) wt),0) shipped_tons, (SELECT (SUM(NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) * 21) + (SUM(NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0)) * 26) FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN consol cnsl ON cvr.charter_voyage_gid = cnsl.charter_voyage_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND((NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) OR (NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0))) AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND cv.dest_location_gid = obl.dest_location_gid AND (TO_DATE((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,2),'MM') AND TO_DATE((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,2)))) booked_tons FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN ob_refnum obref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obref1.order_base_gid AND obref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN ob_line obl ON obref1.order_base_gid = obl.order_base_gid INNER JOIN location loc ON obl.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obref2 ON obl.order_base_gid = obref2.order_base_gid AND obref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE oob.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND SUBSTR(oob.order_base_xid, 1, 1) = 'S' AND obref1.ob_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND (TO_DATE(obl.early_pickup_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,2),'MM') AND TO_DATE(obl.early_pickup_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,2))) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT obr.order_base_gid FROM ob_refnum obr WHERE obr.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CLOSE/REOPEN' AND obr.ob_refnum_value = 'CLOSE')) a GROUP BY a.destination, a.commodity, NVL(ROUND(a.booked_tons,0),0) ORDER BY a.destination, a.commodity

SELECT a.destination destination_b3, a.servprov servprov_b3, NVL(SUM(a.teu_count),0) teus_b3, NVL(SUM(a.feu_count),0) feus_b3 FROM (SELECT cv.charter_voyage_gid, loc1.location_xid destination, loc2.location_xid servprov, NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0) teu_count, NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0) feu_count FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN location loc1 ON cv.dest_location_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN location loc2 ON cv.servprov_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN consol cnsl ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cnsl.charter_voyage_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND ((NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) OR (NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0))) AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND (TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,2),'MM') AND TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,2)))) a GROUP BY a.destination, a.servprov ORDER BY a.destination, a.servprov

SELECT a.destination destination_c4, a.commodity commodity_c4, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.open_tons),0),0) open_tons_c4, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.planned_tons),0),0) planned_tons_c4, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.open_tons),0) - ROUND(SUM(a.shipped_tons),0),0) remaining_tons_c4, NVL(ROUND(a.booked_tons,0),0) booked_tons_c4 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT oob.order_base_gid, loc.location_xid destination, obref2.ob_refnum_value commodity, obl.weight_base / 2204.5855379 open_tons, (SELECT SUM(wt.weight) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid, ((CASE WHEN ssu1.tag_3 IS NULL THEN ssu1.unit_net_weight_base ELSE 0 END) / 2204.5855379) weight FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul1 INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu1 ON ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) wt) planned_tons, NVL((SELECT SUM(wt.weight) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid, ((CASE WHEN ssu1.tag_3 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ssu1.unit_net_weight_base END) / 2204.5855379) weight FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul1 INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu1 ON ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) wt),0) shipped_tons, (SELECT (SUM(NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) * 21) + (SUM(NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0)) * 26) FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN consol cnsl ON cvr.charter_voyage_gid = cnsl.charter_voyage_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND((NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) OR (NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0))) AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND cv.dest_location_gid = obl.dest_location_gid AND (TO_DATE((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,3),'MM') AND TO_DATE((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,3)))) booked_tons FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN ob_refnum obref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obref1.order_base_gid AND obref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN ob_line obl ON obref1.order_base_gid = obl.order_base_gid INNER JOIN location loc ON obl.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obref2 ON obl.order_base_gid = obref2.order_base_gid AND obref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE oob.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND SUBSTR(oob.order_base_xid, 1, 1) = 'S' AND obref1.ob_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND (TO_DATE(obl.early_pickup_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,3),'MM') AND TO_DATE(obl.early_pickup_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,3))) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT obr.order_base_gid FROM ob_refnum obr WHERE obr.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CLOSE/REOPEN' AND obr.ob_refnum_value = 'CLOSE')) a GROUP BY a.destination, a.commodity, NVL(ROUND(a.booked_tons,0),0) ORDER BY a.destination, a.commodity

SELECT a.destination destination_b4, a.servprov servprov_b4, NVL(SUM(a.teu_count),0) teus_b4, NVL(SUM(a.feu_count),0) feus_b4 FROM (SELECT cv.charter_voyage_gid, loc1.location_xid destination, loc2.location_xid servprov, NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0) teu_count, NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0) feu_count FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN location loc1 ON cv.dest_location_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN location loc2 ON cv.servprov_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN consol cnsl ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cnsl.charter_voyage_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND ((NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) OR (NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0))) AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND (TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,3),'MM') AND TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,3)))) a GROUP BY a.destination, a.servprov ORDER BY a.destination, a.servprov

SELECT a.destination destination_c5, a.commodity commodity_c5, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.open_tons),0),0) open_tons_c5, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.planned_tons),0),0) planned_tons_c5, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.open_tons),0) - ROUND(SUM(a.shipped_tons),0),0) remaining_tons_c5, NVL(ROUND(a.booked_tons,0),0) booked_tons_c5 FROM (SELECT DISTINCT oob.order_base_gid, loc.location_xid destination, obref2.ob_refnum_value commodity, obl.weight_base / 2204.5855379 open_tons, (SELECT SUM(wt.weight) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid, ((CASE WHEN ssu1.tag_3 IS NULL THEN ssu1.unit_net_weight_base ELSE 0 END) / 2204.5855379) weight FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul1 INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu1 ON ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) wt) planned_tons, NVL((SELECT SUM(wt.weight) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid, ((CASE WHEN ssu1.tag_3 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ssu1.unit_net_weight_base END) / 2204.5855379) weight FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul1 INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu1 ON ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) wt),0) shipped_tons, (SELECT (SUM(NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) * 21) + (SUM(NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0)) * 26) FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN consol cnsl ON cvr.charter_voyage_gid = cnsl.charter_voyage_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND((NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) OR (NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0))) AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND cv.dest_location_gid = obl.dest_location_gid AND (TO_DATE((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,4),'MM') AND TO_DATE((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,4)))) booked_tons FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN ob_refnum obref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obref1.order_base_gid AND obref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN ob_line obl ON obref1.order_base_gid = obl.order_base_gid INNER JOIN location loc ON obl.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obref2 ON obl.order_base_gid = obref2.order_base_gid AND obref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE oob.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND SUBSTR(oob.order_base_xid, 1, 1) = 'S' AND obref1.ob_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND (TO_DATE(obl.early_pickup_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,4),'MM') AND TO_DATE(obl.early_pickup_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,4))) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT obr.order_base_gid FROM ob_refnum obr WHERE obr.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CLOSE/REOPEN' AND obr.ob_refnum_value = 'CLOSE')) a GROUP BY a.destination, a.commodity, NVL(ROUND(a.booked_tons,0),0) ORDER BY a.destination, a.commodity

SELECT a.destination destination_b5, a.servprov servprov_b5, NVL(SUM(a.teu_count),0) teus_b5, NVL(SUM(a.feu_count),0) feus_b5 FROM (SELECT cv.charter_voyage_gid, loc1.location_xid destination, loc2.location_xid servprov, NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0) teu_count, NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0) feu_count FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN location loc1 ON cv.dest_location_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN location loc2 ON cv.servprov_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN consol cnsl ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cnsl.charter_voyage_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND ((NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) OR (NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0))) AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND (TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,4),'MM') AND TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,4)))) a GROUP BY a.destination, a.servprov ORDER BY a.destination, a.servprov

SELECT a.destination destination_c6, a.commodity commodity_c6, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.open_tons),0),0) open_tons_c6, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.planned_tons),0),0) planned_tons_c6, NVL(ROUND(SUM(a.open_tons),0) - ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) wt) planned_tons, NVL((SELECT SUM(wt.weight) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid, ((CASE WHEN ssu1.tag_3 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ssu1.unit_net_weight_base END) / 2204.5855379) weight FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul1 INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu1 ON ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) wt),0) shipped_tons, (SELECT (SUM(NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) * 21) + (SUM(NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0)) * 26) FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN consol cnsl ON cvr.charter_voyage_gid = cnsl.charter_voyage_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND((NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) OR (NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0))) AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND cv.dest_location_gid = obl.dest_location_gid AND (TO_DATE((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,5),'MM') AND TO_DATE((CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,5)))) booked_tons FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN ob_refnum obref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obref1.order_base_gid AND obref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN ob_line obl ON obref1.order_base_gid = obl.order_base_gid INNER JOIN location loc ON obl.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum obref2 ON obl.order_base_gid = obref2.order_base_gid AND obref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' WHERE oob.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND SUBSTR(oob.order_base_xid, 1, 1) = 'S' AND obref1.ob_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND (TO_DATE(obl.early_pickup_date,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,5),'MM') AND TO_DATE(obl.early_pickup_date,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,5))) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT obr.order_base_gid FROM ob_refnum obr WHERE obr.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND obr.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CLOSE/REOPEN' AND obr.ob_refnum_value = 'CLOSE')) a GROUP BY a.destination, a.commodity, NVL(ROUND(a.booked_tons,0),0) ORDER BY a.destination, a.commodity

SELECT a.destination destination_b6, a.servprov servprov_b6, NVL(SUM(a.teu_count),0) teus_b6, NVL(SUM(a.feu_count),0) feus_b6 FROM (SELECT cv.charter_voyage_gid, loc1.location_xid destination, loc2.location_xid servprov, NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0) teu_count, NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) - NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0) feu_count FROM charter_voyage cv INNER JOIN location loc1 ON cv.dest_location_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN location loc2 ON cv.servprov_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN consol cnsl ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cnsl.charter_voyage_gid WHERE cv.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND NOT cv.is_cancelled = 'Y' AND ((NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_teu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_teu,0)) OR (NOT NVL(cnsl.max_num_feu,0) = NVL(cnsl.allocated_num_feu,0))) AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value = :LOC_CODE AND (TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') >= TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,5),'MM') AND TO_DATE( (CASE WHEN cv.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN cv.departure_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.departure_date, cv.source_location_gid) END) ,'dd-mm-rr') <= LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,5)))) a GROUP BY a.destination, a.servprov ORDER BY a.destination, a.servprov
